name: Influjo
description: [X]% Critical Hit

name: Longitud
description: [X]% Damage Inflicted on aligned targets 2 or more cells away from the state bearer

name: Reprobación
description: -20 Force of Will. Reduces the next AP loss suffered by 1, [X] time(s). The effect is reapplied every turn
effect: Per additional 2 levels: reduces 1 more "AP loss" suffered

name: Arcanos
description: If the state bearer does not have any armor at end of turn: [X]% of level as Armor

name: Mano aliada
description: Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -[X]% Armor received to it (1 turn)

name: Vuelta vital
description: Heal: [X]% of HP lost of the caster on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn)

name: Robo de placaje
description: -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon. When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals [X]% of level in Lock (1 turn not stackable)
effect: Per additional level: steals +15% of level in Lock

name: Arma sólida
description: When inflicting damage on an enemy with a weapon: That enemy reduces their damage on the state bearer by -[X] % (1 turn not stackable) The state bearer must have a shield equipped
effect: Per additional level: reduces the DMG by another -5%

name: Contraataque
description: When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer inflicts light damage on the attacker ([X]% of level)
effect: Per additional level: +10% of level DMG

name: Naturaleza
description: [X]% Heals performed on an ally adjacent to another ally

name: Influjo del Wakfu
description: When the state bearer starts their turn with all their WP (or all their QB): [X]% Critical Hit (1 turn)

name: Revigorización
description: -10% Heals performed. The state bearer is healed by [X] % of heals performed on their allies

name: Crítico técnico
description: The first critical hit in the turn inflicts [X]% additional damageThe following ones inflict -[Y]% less damage
effect: Per additional level: +6% additional DMG -3% less DMG

name: Precaución
description: When ending turn with less than 50% HP: Heals: [X] % of missing HP
effect: Per additional level: +5% of missing health

name: Abandono
description: At the start of the first turn if secondary masteries are <= 0: [X] max WP and [X] Range -[Y]% Armor given and received
effect: Per additional 2 levels: +1 max WP +1 Range -10% armor given/received

name: Coraje
description: [X]% non-critical damage and heals inflicted -[X]% critical damage and heals inflicted
effect: Per additional level: +2% non-crit DMG/Heal. -2% crit DMG/Heal

name: Wakfu Berserker
description: When the state bearer starts their turn with 50% or less of their WP (or their QB): [X]% Critical Damage inflicted (1 turn) [Y]% of level as Armor
effect: Per additional level: +3% Critical Damage +100% armor

name: Experto en armas ligeras
description: If no other shield dagger or two-handed weapon is equipped at start of fight: [X]% of level in Elemental Mastery [Y]% of Damage inflicted on a target with Armor
effect: Per additional level: +25% level of Elemental Mastery +2% Damage inflicted on a target with Armor

name: Media vuelta
description: When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer turns toward them.

name: Última Cura
description: Heal [X]% of max HP when below 20% max hp (once per fight)
effect: Per additional level: heal +5% of max HP

name: Evasión
description: At start of fight: [X]% of level as Dodge
effect: Per additional level: +50% of level as Dodge

name: Visión Intermedia
description: [X]% DMG inflicted on targets exactly 3 cells away

name: Interceptación
description: At start of fight: [X]% of level as Lock

effect: Per additional level: +10% current HP converted

description:
10% damage inflicted when the bearer meets certain conditions (these change each turn). 
Turn 1: The bearer is in melee or the spell is single-target 
Turn 2: The bearer is at a distance or the spell is single-target 
Turn 3: The bearer is at a distance or the spell is area-of-effect 
Turn 4: The bearer is in melee or the spell is area-of-effect

-10% Damage inflicted 
Every 10 spells cast, the state bearer gains 100% Damage inflicted for the next spell 
Spells cast must cost at least 1 AP 
Once the state is at level 10, the next spell gets the damage bonus

name: Exceso II
description:
-10% Damage inflicted 
Every 5 spells cast, the state bearer gains 50% Damage inflicted for the next spell 
Spells cast must cost at least 1 AP 
Once the state is at level 5, the next spell gets the damage bonus

name: Cara a Cara
description:
At end of turn, if the bearer is facing an adjacent enemy: 
10% of max HP as Armor

name: Hipermétrope
description:
30% damage inflicted on targets 7 or more cells away 
otherwise -15%

name: Aura de Llamas
description:
Flaming (+15 Lvls.) (stackable) for the state bearer, for each damage spell received in melee. 
100% of level as Flaming at start of turn if no enemies are adjacent.

name: Guardia Levantada
description: -30% damage received during their own turn.

name: Ahínco
description:
If the bearer moves themself using a spell: 
1 MP (max 2 per turn)

name: Sangre del Martirio
description:
In an uneven round: 
The bearer inflicts 25% more damage, and suffers 15% of the damage they inflict

name: Pesadez Involuntaria
description:
If the bearer is moved outside of their turn:
applies Stabilized at the end of their next turn

name: Último Instante
description:
If the spell costs 1 WP or more:
5% damage per current WP on the bearer (max. 6)

name: Arma de Luz
description: Damage caused by the bearer's weapon is reduced by 20% and applies a poison (Light Weapon) for three turns (second hand excluded) based on the number of AP used by the weapon.

name: Longevidad
description:
When suffering damage from the front and in melee, once per round: 
10% of missing HP as Armor 40% Armor given (1 turn)

name: Lunático
description:
Odd turns, at start of turn: 
25% Damage inflicted -25% Heals performed and Armor given 

Even turns, at start of turn: 
25% Heals performed and Armor given -25% Damage inflicted

name: Lunático II
description:
After inflicting damage on an enemy: 
-30% damage inflicted and 30% heals performed and Armor given for the following turn.

After healing or giving armor to an ally: 
30% damage inflicted and -30% heals performed and armor given for the following turn.

name: Modularidad
description:
After taking damage: 
50 Elemental Resistance in this element (1 turn), not stackable
A new element replaces the previous one

name: Aplomo Natural
description:
50 Elemental Resistance if the bearer has no Armor
otherwise -100 Elemental Resistance

name: Apacible
description:
For each movement, per MP used: 
+3% Block (max. 18) (1 turn) 

If the state bearer performs a Block when it's not their turn: 
The bonus is transformed into Critical Hits on the next turn

name: Resurrección
description:
-50 Elemental Resistance 
Once per turn, when falling below 50% HP: 
1 MP
15% Damage inflicted
50 Elemental Resistance

name: Robusto
description: 100% of level in Barrier against long-range damage (permanent)

name: Centinela
description:
At start of turn: 
3 Range 15% ranged damage 15% Heals performed 
The bonus is lost the first time the character moves (MP) or at end of turn

name: Cota Singular
description:
30% of Armor given to allies who do not have Armor
-50% Armor to allies who already have Armor

name: Cota Singular
description:
40% Armor given on the first Armor placed on this turn
-50% Armor given on all others

name: Rompecaparazón
description: The first spell that inflicts damage this turn removes 30% Armor from the target

name: Burbujeo
description:
At start of turn, if the bearer has no Armor: 
20% Damage inflicted (1 turn) 
Otherwise: -10% Damage inflicted (1 turn)

name: Stasificación
description: The state bearer increases their damage inflicted by 2% per turn (permanent) (max 20)

name: Control del Tiempo
description:
Every 3 spells cast
Critical Hit is set to 100

name: Confianza
description: 30% Block if the bearer did not receive healing in the previous turn.

name: Vehemencia
description:
Each turn steals 50% of damage inflicted by the first spell that inflicts damage
-50% Armor received

name: Seh
description:
Even Turn: 
After using a WP-based spell, the state bearer regains 2 AP (max of 1/turn). 

Odd Turn: 
After using a WP-based spell, the state bearer loses 2 AP (max 1/turn).

name: Sello de Wakfu
description: The state bearer increases their heals performed by 2% per turn (Permanent, max 20%)

name: Castigo
description: At start of turn if there are at least 2 enemies in melee: +1MP +1AP

name: Absolución
description: At start of turn if there are at least 2 allies in melee: +1MP +1AP

name: Anticipación Única
description: When performing a Block: -30% extra damage recieved -100% block

name: Secreto Crítico
description: At the start of combat, if Critical Mastery is less than or equal to 0: 30% critical hit
